scripts.heroku-set-env: heroku config:set MY_HEROKU_URL=$(heroku info -s | grep web_url | cut -d= -f2) && heroku config:set APP_KEYS=$(cat .env | grep APP_KEYS | cut -d= -f2-) && heroku config:set API_TOKEN_SALT=$(cat .env | grep API_TOKEN_SALT | cut -d= -f2) && heroku config:set ADMIN_JWT_SECRET=$(cat .env | grep ADMIN_JWT_SECRET | cut -d= -f2) && heroku config:set JWT_SECRET=$(cat .env | grep -w JWT_SECRET | cut -d= -f2)
scripts.dev-env: heroku config:set NODE_ENV=development && NODE_ENV=development npm run develop
scripts.prod-env: heroku config:set NODE_ENV=production && NODE_ENV=production npm run start
scripts.heroku: heroku config:set NODE_ENV=production && git add . && git commit -m 'deploy!' && git push heroku HEAD:main && heroku open
scripts.git-add: git add . && git commit -m 'Update database config'
scripts.build-develop: npm run build && rm -r build && rm -r .cache && npm run build && npm run develop
